alert.note: Alert for Otsego (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Binghamton (South Central New York and Northeastern Pennsylvania)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 07 at 2:20PM EDT by NWS Binghamton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Otsego County through 245 PM EDT... At 220 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Middlefield, or 8 miles east of Cooperstown, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Middlefield, Westford, Cherry Valley and Betty And Wilbur Davis State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
